item.title: 孙正义和萨姆-奥特曼认为人工智能的需求和扩展永无止境
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp）创始人孙正义（Masayoshi Son）和 OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）认为，人工智能的需求永不满足，因此必须不断提高计算能力。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. founder Masayoshi Son and OpenAI chief Sam Altman see insatiable demand for AI that makes it imperative to keep building ever more computing capacity.】

item.title: 恒瑞肥胖症药物在中国后期试验中与Zepbound抗衡
item.description: 江苏恒瑞医药股份有限公司及其美国合作伙伴称，他们的肥胖症候选药物在中国的一项后期研究中获得成功，这是在国内生物技术公司日益挑战外国竞争对手的情况下，向获得批准迈出的关键一步。【原文：Jiangsu Hengrui Pharmaceuticals Co. and its US partner said their obesity drug candidate succeeded in a late-stage China study, a key step toward securing approval as domestic biotech firms increasingly challenge foreign rivals.】

item.title: 里约称特朗普关税增加了 3 亿美元的铝材成本
item.description: 矿业巨头力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）表示，美国对其加拿大产铝征收的关税在上半年产生了超过 3 亿美元的总成本，这再次表明唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易议程正在撼动金属供应链。【原文：Mining giant Rio Tinto Group said US tariffs on its Canada-made aluminum generated gross costs of more than $300 million in the first half, in another sign of how President Donald Trump’s trade agenda is shaking up metals supply chains.】

item.title: 印度波动率指数因关税担忧缓解和降息希望而下跌
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 摩根士丹利揭开石油市场之谜：石油库存激增
item.description: 摩根士丹利称，近几个月来，全球石油库存迅速增加，但由于增加的大部分是在亚太地区，石油价格目前还能保持稳定。【原文：Global oil inventories have swollen at a rapid clip in recent months, but given the bulk of the increase has been in the Asia-Pacific, prices have been able to hold their ground for now, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 中国财报给在岸股市的雏形反弹带来风险
item.description: 由于美国加征贸易关税，第二季度中国企业盈利增长可能放缓或停滞，这表明最新的业绩季可能不会给股票投资者带来太多好消息。【原文：China’s corporate earnings growth likely slowed or was stagnant in the second quarter as the US ratcheted up trade tariffs, signaling that the latest results season may not offer much in terms of good news for stock investors.】

item.title: TikTok 的中国员工为搬迁美国寻求税收补偿
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，TikTok 的一些中国员工要求公司补偿他们因搬迁到美国而产生的额外税款。【原文：Some of TikTok’s Chinese employees are requesting company compensation for additional taxes incurred due to their relocation to the US, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 恒生指数创 2022 年 2 月以来最高收盘价
item.description: 香港股市基准将创下自 2022 年 2 月以来的最高收盘价，反映出中美贸易紧张局势有缓和迹象，风险偏好有所回升。【原文：Hong Kong’s equity benchmark is heading for its highest close since February 2022, reflecting a rebound in risk appetite on signs of easing US-China trade tensions.】

item.title: 中国万科寻求将部分银行贷款展期长达 10 年
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国万科集团公司正在寻求将其部分国内银行贷款延长多达 10 年，此举可能有助于这家国有开发商降低流动性风险。【原文：China Vanke Co. is seeking to extend some of its domestic bank loans by as much as 10 years, according to people familiar with the matter, a move that could help the state-backed developer reduce liquidity risks.】

item.title: 美国贸易协议可能在短期内刺激印尼资产：分析师
item.description: 据分析师称，与美国达成的贸易协议所带来的积极情绪将提振印尼资产。【原文：Indonesian assets will get a boost from a positive sentiment stemming from a trade deal reached with the US, according to analysts.】

item.title: 特朗普出人意料的贸易协议将影响印尼利率决定
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布的印尼贸易协议为印尼经济提供了一些清晰度，尽管缺乏细节可能会使印尼央行在周三的货币政策会议上保持谨慎。【原文：The Indonesian trade deal announced by US President Donald Trump provides some clarity for the nation’s economy, although the lack of details will likely keep its central bank cautious at its monetary policy meeting Wednesday.】

item.title: 贸易战担忧提升避风港支持率，黄金走高
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发布了一系列与关税相关的公告，表明人们对潜在全球贸易战影响的担忧依然存在，这为避险资产提供了支撑，黄金因此走高。【原文：Gold edged higher after a slew of tariff-related announcements from President Donald Trump signaled concerns over the impact of a potential global trade war remain, giving support to the haven asset.】

item.title: 孟买改头换面的灵感来自 200 年前的纽约蓝图
item.description:
印度官员正斥资数十亿美元改造该国的金融资本和落后的基础设施。【原文：

Indian officials are spending billions to revamp the country’s financial capital and subpar infrastructure.

】

item.title: 罗根称美联储需要更长时间维持利率以抑制通胀
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）表示，虽然决策者可能需要在更长一段时间内保持利率稳定，以充分冷却通胀，但如果通胀和劳动力市场走软，他们也有可能需要转向降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Lorie Logan said that while policymakers will likely need to hold interest rates steady for a bit longer to fully cool inflation, it’s also possible they may need to pivot to cutting if inflation and labor markets soften.】

item.title: 哈塞特在特朗普新任美联储主席竞选中拔得头筹
item.description: 据熟悉这一过程的人士称，凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）是唐纳德-特朗普总统任职时间最长的经济助手之一，他是明年接替杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）担任美联储主席的早期热门人选。【原文：Kevin Hassett, one of President Donald Trump’s longest-serving economic aides, is the early frontrunner to replace Jerome Powell as Federal Reserve chief next year, according to people familiar with the process.】

item.title: 关注贸易政策和需求信号，石油走高
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）吹捧贸易政策取得的进展，以及交易商对近期市场走强迹象的评估，石油走高。【原文：Oil ticked higher as US President Donald Trump touted progress in trade policy, and traders assessed signs of near-term market strength.】

item.title: 特朗普称可能在 8 月 1 日前对药品征收关税，淡化更多交易
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他可能最快于本月底对药品征收关税，并可能很快对半导体征税，这表明这些进口税可能与定于8月1日实施的广泛 "互惠 "税率同时开征。【原文：President Donald Trump said that he was likely to impose tariffs on pharmaceuticals as soon as the end of the month and that levies on semiconductors could come soon as well, suggesting that those import taxes could hit alongside broad “reciprocal” rates set for implementation on Aug. 1.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表对巴西展开 301 条款调查
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对巴西征收 50%的关税一周后，美国贸易代表办公室周二开始对巴西的贸易行为及其是否不公平地限制了美国对巴西的出口展开调查。【原文：The Office of the US Trade Representative on Tuesday opened an investigation into Brazil over its trade practices and whether they are unfairly restricting US exports to the country, a week after President Donald Trump threatened a 50% tariff on the country.】

item.title: 需求激增，中国可转债涨至十年新高
item.description: 可转换债券已成为今年中国最受欢迎的资产类别之一，其表现超过了本地股票和固定收益。【原文：Convertible bonds have emerged as one of the most popular asset classes in China this year, trouncing the performance of local stocks and fixed income.】

item.title: 美联储押注减弱，亚洲交易员谨慎行事：市场综述
item.description: 在好坏参半的美国通胀数据刺激交易商减少美联储降息押注后，亚洲股市开盘谨慎。美元上涨，国债下跌，日元触及 4 月以来最弱。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set for a cautious open after mixed US inflation data spurred traders to trim Federal Reserve rate-cut bets. The dollar rose, Treasuries declined and the yen touched its weakest since April.】

item.title: 力拓任命新首席执行官后称铁矿石出口稳定
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）第二季度的铁矿石发货量在很大程度上恢复了前三个月受飓风影响的状况，这家大型矿业公司正在为新任首席执行官上任做准备。【原文：Rio Tinto Group’s second-quarter iron ore shipments largely recovered from cyclone impacts in the previous three months, as the major miner prepares for a new chief executive officer to take charge.】

item.title: 香港第五次捍卫外汇联系汇率制，压力持续扩大
item.description: 香港当局在大约三周内第五次采取干预措施，以防止该市货币的疲软超出其官方交易范围。【原文：Hong Kong authorities intervened for the fifth time in about three weeks to prevent the city’s currency from weakening beyond its official trading band.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会撤销针对 Cognizant 前高管的贿赂案
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会动议驳回针对 Cognizant Technology Solutions Corp. 两名前高管的长期贿赂案，这是特朗普政府不再执行《反海外腐败法》的最新迹象。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission moved to dismiss a long-running bribery case against two former executives of Cognizant Technology Solutions Corp., the latest sign of the Trump administration’s shift away from enforcing the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act.】

item.title: 在以太币的最新推动下，套利交易重新流行起来
item.description: David Pan 深入探讨了交易商如何试图将以太币从低迷中唤醒。【原文：David Pan takes a deeper look at the how traders are trying to shake Ether from its doldrums.】

item.title: 惠誉称：不良债务转换的复苏胜过破产
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）的一份报告显示，与破产相比，不良债务交换为贷款人带来了更好的平均结果。【原文：Distressed debt exchanges have been delivering better average outcomes for lenders compared to bankruptcies, according to a Fitch Ratings report.】

item.title: Cantor 筹建第二家比特币财政公司，拥有 25000 个代币
item.description: 坎托-菲茨杰拉德（Cantor Fitzgerald）支持的一家投资机构正与比特币先驱亚当-巴克（Adam Back）合作成立一家新的财务公司，这将是该投资银行的第二笔此类交易。【原文：An investment vehicle backed by Cantor Fitzgerald is working with Bitcoin pioneer Adam Back on a new treasury company in what would be the second such deal for the investment bank.】

item.title: 日本 "大米大臣 "是执政党最大的选举赌注
item.description:
降低全国主食价格的紧急行动优先考虑城市消费者的选票，而非农村支持者的选票

Emergency action to lower price of nation’s staple prioritizes votes of urban consumers over rural supporters

】

item.title: 小唐纳德-特朗普和奥米德-马利克结怨后仍 "支持埃隆
item.description: 1789 资本公司（1789 Capital）的合伙人小唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump Jr.）表示，该投资公司仍在财务上支持埃隆-马斯克的公司，并对这位亿万富翁与他的父亲--美国总统--的公开不和保持缄默。【原文：Donald Trump Jr., a partner at 1789 Capital, said the investment firm still supports Elon Musk’s companies financially and is looking past the billionaire’s public falling-out with his father, the US president.】

item.title: 自四月份关税引发的暴跌以来，债券市场迎来最糟糕的一天
item.description: 周二，由于新的通胀数据导致交易商降低了对 9 月份降息的预期，市政债券遭到抛售，基准收益率最高上涨了 8 个基点。【原文：Municipal bonds sold off on Tuesday, with benchmark yields rising as much as eight basis points, as new inflation data caused traders to par back expectations for an interest-rate cut in September.】

item.title: 美国 30 年期债券收益率突破 5%，债券交易员加大看跌押注
item.description: 由于担心关税引发的通胀风险以及全球一些最大经济体政府支出的增加，国债市场的看跌基调正在形成。【原文：A bearish tone is taking hold in the Treasury market amid worries over the risk of tariff-fueled inflation and increased government spending in some of the world’s biggest economies.】
